    What We Offer

    Programs designed for your success

    Technical Training

    Hands-on training in structural detailing, setting out, concrete volume calculation, formwork design, and site supervision for civil and mechanical engineers.

    Soft Skills Development

    Communication, project management, teamwork, and leadership skills essential for the building environment.

    Internship Placement

    6-month placements with our 20+ partner construction and engineering firms for real-world site experience.

    Testimonials

    What our graduates say

    ERA didn't just teach me engineering — they taught me how to be a professional. The site experience, mentorship, and soft skills training all came together. I was placed within two months of completing the programme.

    Tofunmi Adeyinka

    Site Engineer at Calebella Integritas Projects · Cohort 3

    Before ERA, I could solve problems on paper but had never supervised a concrete pour. The hands-on training on active construction sites gave me confidence that no textbook ever could.

    Hamzah Babatunde

    Project Coordinator at Black Diamond Engineering · Cohort 4

    The AutoCAD and structural drawing modules were exceptional. I went from struggling with basic commands to producing full structural detail drawings within four weeks. ERA's instructors are practising engineers — they teach what they do.

    Wright Okonkwo

    Structural Engineer at HFP Engineering · Cohort 5

    As a mechanical engineering graduate pivoting into construction, ERA gave me the practical foundation I needed. The site supervision module and concrete works training were exactly what employers were looking for.

    Emeka Okafor

    Site Supervisor at Craneburg Construction · Cohort 6
